Definition at line 64 of file object.h.

#define RDK2_FACTORY ( classe   )     RDK2::Meta::Factory factory_ ## classe (new classe());

To add a factory, just add a line like this: RDK2_FACTORY(MyClass) in a cpp file. This creates a static object of class Factory (see below) whose constructor will be executed at init. time and will put a prototype in the database.
